translation.en: I hereby call this Thompson family meeting to order.
translation.zh: ‎我宣布这次汤普森家庭会议开始

translation.en: Now, if you all please turn to slide one,
translation.zh: ‎好了 请大家看幻灯片第一页

translation.en: you'll see that a third car can actually save the family money over the long run.
translation.zh:
‎可以看到第三辆车长久来看
‎会帮家庭省钱的

translation.en: Mine's just GIFs of baby porcupines eating corn on the cob.
translation.zh: ‎我的上面只有小豪猪吃玉米棒的动图

translation.en: Because I already know your views on increasing our carbon footprint,
translation.zh:
‎因为我已经知道你对于
‎增加我们碳足迹的想法

translation.en: so your presentation is just Best of Baby Animals.
translation.zh:
‎所以你的幻灯片全是
‎小动物动图精选

translation.en: Oh. Good thinking.
So, Mom, Dad, if you'll please turn to slide two,
translation.zh: ‎所以 爸爸妈妈 请翻到第二页

translation.en: you'll see that my learner's permit driving record is blemish-free.
translation.zh:
‎可以看到我持学习驾照的驾驶记录
‎完美无瑕

translation.en: Did you hire character witnesses again?
translation.zh: ‎你是不是又雇了品德信誉见证人？

translation.en: If that's your driver's ed teacher, he's not staying for dinner.
translation.zh:
‎如果是你的驾校老师
‎我不会允许他留下来吃晚饭的

translation.en: Where were you?
I've been waiting at the train station all day.
Who are you?
I'm Nick. Nicole?
Nicole Patterson?
I'm here to live with you.
Okay, what?
You didn't get the memo?
Was this an actual or metaphorical memo?
translation.zh: ‎是真的有备忘录？还是比喻性的？

translation.en: They said they called and emailed.
translation.zh: ‎他们说他们打了电话又发了邮件

translation.en: -[Nick sobs] -Okay, sweetie. Just tell us what happened.
translation.zh: ‎好了 宝贝 告诉我们发生了什么

translation.en: What happened is...
my parents...
died in a car accident six months ago,
and I've been in foster care until they could find some relatives,
translation.zh:
‎我一直在寄养家庭
‎直到他们能找到我的亲戚

translation.en: and then they said they found my dad's second cousin twice removed,
translation.zh:
‎然后他们说找到了我爸爸的
‎隔两代的堂哥

translation.en: or something, and you were supposed to pick me up at the train station.
translation.zh:
‎还是什么的
‎然后你们会去火车站接我

translation.en: You don't know what I'm talking about. Now I'll have to go back to foster care!
translation.zh:
‎你们不知道我在说什么
‎现在我只能回寄养家庭了

translation.en: Hang on a second. Nobody's making you go anywhere.
translation.zh: ‎慢着 没人逼你去任何地方

translation.en: We'll get to the bottom of this. You just never clarified if the memo was real.
translation.zh:
‎我们会一探究竟的 你只是没说清
‎备忘录到底是不是真的

translation.en: Here's the letter from the state.
Here's a picture of my great-grandma with, I guess, your grandma, or something.
translation.zh:
‎这是我曾祖母和你的…
‎我猜是祖母之类的合影

translation.en: Oh, Grandma Liza!
And they gave me this family tree. Oh God, this is a total nightmare!
translation.zh:
‎他们还给了我这个家谱图
‎老天 简直是噩梦！

translation.en: Okay, let's take a deep breath.
Molly, why don't you take...
-Nick! -Nick...
to get something to eat while we sort this out.
translation.zh: ‎去吃点东西 我们研究一下情况

translation.en: Hi, I'm Molly. Do you like quinoa?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我是茉莉 你喜欢藜麦吗？

translation.en: Or is this more of an ice cream situation?
translation.zh: ‎还是说现在这状况更适合吃冰淇淋？

translation.en: Again, I'm so, so sorry about the mix-up, folks.
translation.zh: ‎我再次抱歉我搞混了 各位

translation.en: I have got egg on my face.
translation.zh: ‎我出糗了 感觉脸上被砸了鸡蛋

translation.en: Oh, this is more than egg. This is a quiche.
translation.zh: ‎不 不止是鸡蛋 是蛋饼

translation.en: You quiched us.
Mistakes happen. Don't beat yourself up about it.
translation.zh: ‎错误不可避免 不要太往心里去了

translation.en: Bye-bye.
Can you believe that this social services coordinator
translation.zh: ‎你能相信吗？这个社会服务协调员

translation.en: was coordinating with another Ed Thompson?
translation.zh: ‎和另一个叫艾德·汤普森的人协调了

translation.en: I feel so generic!
-I wish I had a cool nickname. -Ooh, how about Laser?
translation.zh:
‎-我真希望我有个酷酷的昵称
‎-激光怎么样？

translation.en: -No. -Yes.
[sighs] All right, well...
this is, uh, quite a shock.
We were literally caught with our pants down.
translation.zh: ‎我们在字面意义上被扒了裤子

translation.en: That's literally not what literally means.
translation.zh: ‎这个词在字面意义上就不是这个意思

translation.en: Irregardless...
we are problem solvers.
We'll make this work.
So where's my room?
Well, that's a problem. I have no idea.
Nick can stay with me in my room.
translation.zh: ‎妮可可以和我一起睡我的房间

translation.en: Seriously? I'm not even allowed in your room.
translation.zh: ‎真的吗？你都不允许我进你房间

translation.en: Come on, I'll show you where you can put your stuff
translation.zh: ‎来吧 我告诉你把东西放在哪里

translation.en: and how to follow me on Snap and Insta. Not Facebook.
translation.zh:
‎如何在Snapchat和Instagram上
‎关注我 脸书就算了

translation.en: Mom joined.
So this is going to be our room. That sofa pulls out into a bed.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们要住在这个房间里
‎那个沙发可以变成床

translation.en: But don't worry, it's more comfortable than it looks.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 比它看起来要舒服得多

translation.en: You're being so nice to me.
I really appreciate this.
Hey, I care about helping people.
It's kind of my thing.
My thing is watching old Rocky and Bullwinkle cartoons,
translation.zh: ‎我的专长是看《飞鼠洛基冒险记》

translation.en: but I like your thing, too.
You can put your stuff here, and the Wi-Fi is "ThompsonsRule!"
translation.zh:
‎你可以把东西放在这里
‎WiFi密码是汤普森万岁！

translation.en: All one word, cap T, cap R, exclam.
translation.zh: ‎都是一个词 注意大小写 加感叹号

translation.en: I know.
Hey, can I take a shower or something?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我能洗个澡什么的吗？

translation.en: I haven't changed my clothes in, like, two days.
Wow, that's super real.
The bathroom's in through there.
Thanks...
for everything.
I'm in.
I really like her.
Of course you like her. She's an orphan.
translation.zh: ‎你当然喜欢她了 她是个孤儿

translation.en: Your friend Becky is going to be so jealous.
You must be tired of her hogging all the attention with her brother's tumor.
translation.zh:
‎你恨死她了吧？用她哥哥的肿瘤
‎吸引了所有人注意

translation.en: -I don't care what Becky thinks. -Hey.
Maybe you can dress Nick up like a hobo and take selfies down at the dump.
translation.zh:
‎也许你可以把妮可扮成流浪汉
‎和她一起去垃圾站自拍

translation.en: So, she's staying?
I'm just gonna say what your father and I are both thinking.
translation.zh: ‎我就直接说出你爸爸和我的想法吧

translation.en: Nick can't stay here.
Wait, what?
That's not what I was thinking. I was thinking the exact opposite.
translation.zh: ‎这不是我的想法 我的想法完全相反

translation.en: Are you serious?
Because you're talking about raising another child, like, forever.
translation.zh:
‎因为你说的可是再养一个孩子
‎养她一辈子

translation.en: Not forever. Just 'til she's been with us long enough to need therapy.
translation.zh:
‎不用一辈子 只要养到她
‎和我们待到需要看心理医生

translation.en: That sounds like a worthy goal, but I'm busy right now,
translation.zh:
‎听起来是个挺值当的目标
‎但我现在有点忙

translation.en: with the cookbook and restaurant.
And the auditions for Top Chef coming up.
translation.zh: ‎别忘了我还要试镜《顶级大厨》

translation.en: Believe me, no one can forget because you talk about it all the time.
translation.zh:
‎相信我 没人会忘记的
‎因为你一直在说这件事

translation.en: Guys.
Mom's got a point. I mean, she's just being realistic here.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈说得有道理 她只是考虑现实

translation.en: Exactly.
Look, I get that Nick's situation is sad.
translation.zh: ‎看 我知道妮可的处境挺悲伤的

translation.en: Super sad.
So sad.
But why does that have to make our situation sad?
translation.zh:
‎但为什么要因此而让我们的情况
‎也变悲伤？

translation.en: Because she's family.
She's such a distant relative, we could legally get married.
translation.zh:
‎她太远亲了 法律意义上
‎我们结婚都不成问题

translation.en: Um, ew.
So what, you just wanna kick her out?
No. No one's saying kick her out.
I'm just saying, why does she have to stay... here?
translation.zh: ‎我只是说她为什么非得待在这里？

translation.en: I'll tell you why she has to stay here.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉你她为什么非得待在这里

translation.en: Because she's a child who needs us.
translation.zh: ‎因为她是个需要我们的孩子

translation.en: Do I want another kid? No, I don't even want these two.
translation.zh:
‎我想再要个孩子吗？不
‎这两个我都不想要

translation.en: Just a joke, guys.
I love you so much, so much, but the point is...
translation.zh: ‎我非常爱你们的 但重点是

translation.en: that she's my second cousin, and she's already been removed twice.
translation.zh:
‎她是我的二代堂妹
‎而且已经被隔离了两代了

translation.en: We can't do it to her a third time.
Yeah, I don't think that's what that means.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你理解错了隔二代的意思

translation.en: It doesn't matter. We can't kick her out on the street. That's not who we are.
translation.zh:
‎这不重要 我们不能赶她出去
‎流落街头 这不是我们的为人

translation.en: Dad's right.
We have to do the right thing here.
I vote she stays.
This isn't a reality show. You don't get to vote her on or off the island.
translation.zh:
‎这不是真人秀 不能投票决定
‎要不要赶她下岛

translation.en: Everyone's opinion matters.
And thank you, Jeremy. I'm glad to see you coming around on this.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你杰瑞米 很高兴你想开了

translation.en: Yeah, you know, me too.
Because raising a child is expensive
and we'll have to make sacrifices.
And first to go will be that new car you wanted.
translation.zh: ‎第一个要牺牲的就是你想要的新车

translation.en: You know, and for the record, I was gonna say yes.
translation.zh: ‎而且郑重声明 我本打算赞成的

translation.en: Seriously?
I change my vote. I change my vote.
I vote for the car.
You can't change your vote.
[Liz] Wait. This is a tie,
-and the tie goes to the runner. -[Jeremy] What does that even mean?
translation.zh:
‎-打平的时候负责人获胜
‎-这什么意思？

translation.en: So does she want Spanish or French?
You can give her Klingon for all I care. This is just temporary.
translation.zh:
‎学克林贡语都不要紧
‎我不管 这只是暂时的

translation.en: So Spanish?
[Nick] Wow.
Looks like you're a big deal around here.
Yeah, I know.
Slow your roll.
You're sophomore class rep, not King of the North.
translation.zh: ‎你只是高二班代表 又不是北方之王

translation.en: Nick, sweetie...
I know this is a difficult situation,
and you could probably use some sort of inspirational speech right now.
translation.zh:
‎现在你可能很想听一些
‎鼓舞人心的演讲

translation.en: So...
hold onto your dreams and...
reach for the stars...
and seize the day.
Okay.
Bye.
So Jeremy's kind of full of himself.
Totally.
He even keeps a future resume on his phone
translation.zh: ‎他手机上上甚至存了一份未来简历

translation.en: to remind him of all the things he needs to accomplish by the time he's 35.
translation.zh: ‎提醒自己在35岁之前要完成的事

translation.en: Spoiler alert, he becomes president.
Well, he doesn't seem to like me.
I guess he just doesn't want some sketchy foster kid living in his house.
translation.zh:
‎我猜他不想要凑数的寄养家庭孩子
‎和他住在一起吧

translation.en: Hey,
just because you haven't been afforded the same opportunities we have,
translation.zh:
‎只是因为你没有获得
‎和我们一样的机遇

translation.en: doesn't make you sketchy.
Oh, my God, it means so much to hear you say that.
translation.zh: ‎老天 你这么说对我太重要了

translation.en: I can really tell you care.
That's my gift.
Well, I wish everyone saw it that way.
Think you could talk to Jeremy for me?
I totally would, honest,
but Jeremy only cares about Jeremy.
Sorry.
Big news, everyone.
This is Nick.
She's come to live with us because...
translation.zh: ‎妮可住在我们家了 因为…

translation.en: her parents died in a car crash.
So you're like...
a for real orphan?
Uh... yeah, I guess so.
Wow.
-Nick'll want to join our volunteer squad. -Your what?
translation.zh:
‎-妮可会想加入我们的志愿小队
‎-你的什么？

translation.en: We volunteer at soup kitchens, hospitals, old folks' homes.
translation.zh:
‎我们去流动厨房、医院、养老院
‎做志愿活动

translation.en: We're kind of Insta-famous.
Wow. You guys are super woke.
Totally.
Oh, wow, Molly. I just noticed.
translation.zh: ‎哇 茉莉 我刚意识到

translation.en: You're wearing a top from a major trans-national corporate retailer.
translation.zh: ‎你穿了一件大型跨国零售商的上衣

translation.en: I am?
We're only shopping at Helping the Homeless Thrift Stores now.
translation.zh:
‎我们现在只去
‎帮助无家可归人士二手店购物了

translation.en: You know, #childlabor.
Actually, Helping the Homeless
translation.zh: ‎事实上 帮助无家可归人士二手店

translation.en: only donates nine percent of its profits to the homeless.
translation.zh: ‎只捐助9%的钱给无家可归人口

translation.en: Its CEO lives in Aspen.
And true fact,
supporting clothes manufacturers in developing nations
translation.zh: ‎支持发展中国家的服装制造业

translation.en: lifts millions out of poverty every year.
[stammers] I knew that.
You know what? I'll talk to Jeremy and see what I can do.
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？我会和杰瑞米谈谈看

translation.en: Okay, people,
let's take out your chloroform and prepare to anesthetize your frogs.
translation.zh: ‎拿出你们的氯仿 准备麻醉青蛙

translation.en: Stand with me to save the frogs!
What do we want?
Animal rights!
When do we want it?
Now!
Point of order, I move we table this and send it to committee.
translation.zh:
‎议事程序问题 我提议延迟讨论这个
‎交给委员会

translation.en: You're not supposed to be in here. Student council members only.
translation.zh:
‎你不应该进来的
‎只有学生会成员可以进这里

translation.en: We're trying to pass a critical dance budget.
translation.zh: ‎我们在努力批准很重要的跳舞预算

translation.en: Spotify and five bucks worth of streamers...
translation.zh: ‎用Spotify 再买五美元的彩色纸带

translation.en: Problem solved.
Now come talk in the hallway.
Don't underestimate the work we do on student council.
translation.zh: ‎不要低估我们学生会的工作

translation.en: It benefits the whole school.
Says the dictator who canceled our meals on wheels program.
translation.zh:
‎你个取消了上门送餐服务的独裁者
‎还好意思说

translation.en: Because the insurance was cost-prohibitive.
They could've all come to the ice cream social
translation.zh: ‎他们本可以直接参加冰淇淋社交

translation.en: if you hadn't staged a protest.
Because ice cream isn't fair to the lactose intolerant.
translation.zh:
‎因为冰淇淋对于乳糖不耐受的人
‎是不公平的

translation.en: And, uh, speaking of intolerant,
why are you being such a jerk to Nick?
There's something weird about that girl.
You're just being judgmental.
Besides, Dad said everything was legit.
translation.zh: ‎而且爸爸都说了 一切都正常

translation.en: I'm not buying it. Girls don't just show up on your doorstep. Well, not yours.
translation.zh:
‎-我不信 妹子不会直接出现在家门口
‎-肯定不会到你家门口

translation.en: Admit it,
all you care about is getting your stupid car.
Which, by the way, is killing our planet, thank you very much.
translation.zh:
‎顺便说 车会让地球加速死亡
‎非常感谢

translation.en: And all you care about is your social media blowing up
translation.zh: ‎你只关心你的社交媒体点击量

translation.en: because your latest pet project happens to be a human.
translation.zh:
‎因为你最新的宠物计划的主角
‎是一个人

translation.en: That's offensive.
I care about making the world a better place.
Becky's the one turning everything into a competition.
translation.zh: ‎贝基才是把一切都变成竞赛的人

translation.en: Look,
promise me you'll try and be nice to Nick.
translation.zh: ‎向我保证你会试着对妮可友善一点

translation.en: The only thing I can promise you
is I'm gonna find out what's really going on with her.
translation.zh: ‎我会搞清楚她到底是什么情况

translation.en: Where is your new best friend, anyway?
translation.zh: ‎你的新的最好朋友去哪儿了？

translation.en: How did you like my performance yesterday?
Well, to be honest, Dorothy, it was a bit sloppy.
translation.zh: ‎老实说 多萝西 有一点马虎了

translation.en: What if they figured out that you and Sam are my real foster parents?
translation.zh:
‎如果他们发现你和山姆
‎就是我寄养家庭父母怎么办？

translation.en: Your pictures are online in the state database.
translation.zh: ‎你们的照片在网上和州数据库里都有

translation.en: Well, obviously, they didn't look.
But you could've at least worn a disguise.
My disguise was a pantsuit.
It's true. She never wears those.
translation.zh: ‎没错 ‎她从来不穿西装裤套装

translation.en: Listen...
How's the plan going?
Good. They don't suspect anything.
They better not, after all the money we spent on the documents.
translation.zh:
‎最好如此 毕竟我们在文件上
‎花了那么多钱

translation.en: You know how much a fake court order costs?
translation.zh: ‎你知道假造法庭令要花多少钱吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I can get one in an hour for 30 bucks.
translation.zh:
‎知道 我花30美元
‎一个小时之后就能拿到

translation.en: Oh.
That would've saved me $500!
It still seems like it's an awful lot of effort
just to rob a random family.
translation.zh: ‎就为了抢劫随便找的一家人

translation.en: Really, it's too much effort
translation.zh: ‎真的吗？价值五万美元的抢劫

translation.en: for a $50,000 score?
They have two high-end cars,
jewelry, watches, silverware.
And with me on the inside,
there's no messy break-in, no alarms, no surprises.
translation.zh:
‎不需要任何凌乱的闯入
‎不会触发警报 不会有意外

translation.en: Okay, so how do you plan to knock 'em out?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你计划怎么把他们击昏？

translation.en: Don't worry. Leave it to me. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
translation.zh:
‎别担心 交给我就行
‎我准备好了会通知你们

translation.en: You're already ready.
In and out, easy-peasy. That's the plan.
translation.zh: ‎进去就出来 轻松容易 这就是计划

translation.en: I'm on the inside,
so I make the call.
And we clean them out
when I say so.
And can I borrow 20 bucks?
You would not believe what they charge for a latte at this school.
translation.zh:
‎你们不会相信
‎这学校一杯拿铁卖多少钱

translation.en: Okay, listen up, people.
We are doing the orecchiette with a pork fennel sausage.
translation.zh:
‎我们今晚要做茴香猪肉香肠
‎猫耳朵意面

translation.en: The special is a brown-sugar ricotta and egg raviolo.
translation.zh:
‎特色菜是红糖里卡多奶酪
‎和意大利蛋饺

translation.en: Okay, we open in two hours, so get busy cooking or...
translation.zh:
‎好了 我们两小时后营业
‎所以忙着做饭吧 否则就

translation.en: [all] Get busy collecting unemployment.
Nick, what are you doing here?
Well, back at the foster home, all the kids had to pull their weight.
translation.zh:
‎在寄养家庭里
‎所有孩子都要分担工作

translation.en: So I thought I could help out. I know my way around restaurants.
translation.zh: ‎我想帮忙 餐厅我熟悉的

translation.en: That is so thoughtful slash depressing.
But thanks, everything's under control here.
translation.zh: ‎不过多谢 一切都在我掌控中

translation.en: Does that look like fennel to you?
Sorry, I'm obviously too busy to babysit.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我明显太忙了没空照看你

translation.en: Is everyone here completely incompetent?
translation.zh: ‎这里所有人都这么不称职吗？

translation.en: Cut that.
Wow, that's impressive.
Where did you learn to do that?
I was a cocktail waitress in Vegas for a couple years.
translation.zh:
‎我在拉斯维加斯做过几年
‎鸡尾酒服务生

translation.en: Kidding.
I told you, I have some experience in restaurants.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉过你 我在餐厅有些经验

translation.en: Besides, I like working.
It makes me feel... useful.
Okay, I guess we could use some help around here.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我们确实需要一些帮手

translation.en: But if the child labor people show up, you are 18.
translation.zh:
‎但如果劳工部门的人出现
‎你18岁了

translation.en: Oh, hey.
How was your day?
What do you mean?
I don't know, isn't that like a standard question kids ask their dad?
translation.zh:
‎不知道 这不是普通孩子
‎都会问爸爸的常规问题吗？

translation.en: Maybe in 1955, but not my kids.
translation.zh: ‎也许1955年会吧 我孩子可不会问

translation.en: Well, their loss.
Actually...
to tell you the truth, I did have quite a day.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我今天的确发生了很多事

translation.en: You see, I'm a senior loan officer at a bank,
translation.zh: ‎我是一家银行的高级信贷人员

translation.en: I have to decide who to give loans to.
That sounds really interesting.
It does?
Yeah, I mean, don't you get all sorts of fascinating people
translation.zh: ‎不是会经常有各种各样吸引人的客户

translation.en: coming into your bank all the time?
Actually, yes, I do.
And they must have all kinds of stories to tell,
translation.zh: ‎他们肯定有各种各样的故事要说

translation.en: trying to buy a house or start a business.
If you think about it,
you're kind of in the dream business...
making people's dreams come true.
Wow.
You really get me.
It's just, my dad got a loan to start a business once.
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸曾经申请过贷款想做生意

translation.en: He worked hard his whole life,
and I remember when I was, I don't know, maybe just like four or five...
translation.zh: ‎我记得我大概四五岁的时候

translation.en: he came home one night with a big cake
translation.zh: ‎他有一天拿着一个大蛋糕回来

translation.en: with white frosting and these little pink flowers on top.
translation.zh:
‎抹了白色的糖霜
‎上面还有粉色的小花

translation.en: You should have seen the look in his eye.
translation.zh: ‎真想让你看看他当时的眼神

translation.en: I remember it like it was yesterday.
translation.zh: ‎我记得很清楚 就像昨天

translation.en: He was proud.
And so was I.
Yeah.
I have seen that look many times.
There's one lady who wants to open a yoga studio.
-She-- -[cell phone beeps]
Can you hold that thought?
I've gotta answer this message about my...
translation.zh: ‎我需要回这条信息 是关于我的…

translation.en: math homework.
Don't worry about it.
I'm terrible at math, and I work at a bank.
translation.zh: ‎我数学可差了 还能在银行工作

translation.en: That's what calculators are for.
Oh, good.
You got my text.
So, what's your real name?
Nicole Patterson is my real name.
Then, uh, who's Nicole Masipag?
That's also my name.
After my parents died...
I sometimes used my mom's last name.
I don't know why.
I guess I just wanted something to remember her by.
translation.zh: ‎我猜我只是想有些东西可以纪念她

translation.en: What gives you the right to go through my stuff?
translation.zh: ‎谁给你翻查我东西的权力的？

translation.en: Well, technically, it's Molly's room,
translation.zh: ‎严格意义上说这是茉莉的房间

translation.en: so you have no real expectation of privacy here.
translation.zh: ‎所以你在这里没有对隐私的期待

translation.en: Why do you hate me so much?
I don't hate you.
I just don't trust you.
Hey, I get it.
You're obviously super-smart,
in a serial killer kind of way.
Uh, thanks?
And you're a natural leader.
So you think it's your job to protect everyone.
translation.zh: ‎所以你觉得保护所有人是你的职责

translation.en: But you don't have to worry about me.
I'm not trying to cause a disturbance in the Force.
Sorry.
I saw your Star Wars pajamas in the laundry.
translation.zh:
‎在洗衣房
‎看到了你的《星球大战》睡衣

translation.en: You're smooth. You're a lot smarter than you seem.
translation.zh: ‎你很圆滑 你比看起来聪明多了

translation.en: Wow.
Rude.
Look, I know this isn't just about me ruining that new car for you.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我知道这不只是因为
‎我让你的新车泡汤了

translation.en: Maybe you're just afraid of sharing everything else you do have
translation.zh: ‎也许你只是害怕与一个你不认识的人

translation.en: with someone you don't know.
I don't know what you're up to, but I'm gonna find out.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道你有什么企图
‎但我会研究出来的

translation.en: I'm not up to anything.
I'm just a girl who needs a family.
translation.zh: ‎我只是一个需要家庭的女孩

translation.en: Okay?
Are we good?
Oh, we're far from good... Nick.
translation.zh: ‎我们的问题大着呢 妮可

translation.en: Dorothy, it's me. I'm pulling the trigger.
translation.zh: ‎多萝西 我要发号施令了

translation.en: Tell Sam tonight's the night I knock them out.
translation.zh: ‎告诉山姆 我今晚就会把他们击昏

translation.en: I'll text you when they're unconscious.
translation.zh: ‎等他们失去意识了我会发短信

translation.en: I don't care if it's Armed Forces Week on Wheel of Fortune!
translation.zh:
‎我才不管是不是幸运大转盘节目的
‎武装部队周

translation.en: Just record it!
[Ed] So...
how was your day?
What do you mean?
That's exactly what I said when Nick asked me. Man.
translation.zh:
‎妮可问我这个问题的时候
‎我也是这么回答的 妈呀

translation.en: Is it possible that we are so self-absorbed we don't even recognize it
translation.zh:
‎我们有没有可能自私到了 ‎别人有兴趣了解我们的生活
‎都意识不到了？

translation.en: when someone takes an interest in our lives?
translation.zh:
‎别人有兴趣了解我们的生活
‎都意识不到了？

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you and your little ward had some time for a tête-à-tête,
translation.zh:
‎我很高兴你和你的小被监护人
‎知心交谈了起来

translation.en: but I'm trying to get dinner ready. I could use help.
translation.zh: ‎但我在努力做晚饭 需要一点帮助

translation.en: Yeah, Nick's got me thinking.
translation.zh: ‎行 妮可让我思考了起来

translation.en: I mean...
sometimes I feel like we are strangers living in the same house.
translation.zh:
‎有时候我感觉我们是生活在
‎同一个屋檐下的陌生人

translation.en: I mean, shouldn't we care more about the little things?
translation.zh: ‎我们不应该更加关注小事情吗？

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds great, but I don't know how to make that happen.
translation.zh: ‎听起来很棒 但我不知道要如何做到

translation.en: Neither do I, but maybe we can figure it out.
translation.zh: ‎我也不知道 也许我们可以一起思考

translation.en: Remember, we're a team. You're the brain, I'm the heart.
translation.zh:
‎记住 我们是一个团队
‎你是大脑 我是心脏

translation.en: Together, we make the Thompson body run like clockwork.
translation.zh:
‎我们一起努力
‎就能让汤普森家井井有条

translation.en: Yeah, but why do I always have to be the brain?
translation.zh: ‎行吧 但我为什么总得做大脑？

translation.en: What's wrong with the brain? Being the brain is a compliment.
translation.zh: ‎做大脑怎么了？做大脑是对你的赞美

translation.en: Well, sometimes I wanna be the heart.
The heart is the fun job. Everyone loves the heart.
translation.zh: ‎心脏是有趣的职位 所有人都爱心脏

translation.en: Nobody likes the brain.
The brain makes you do your homework and empty the dishwasher,
translation.zh: ‎因为大脑逼你写作业 清空洗碗机

translation.en: while the heart gets to go out for ice cream
and take in stray children.
I'll get it.
It'd better not be another stray child.
Thanks.
What's this?
It's called "pizza."
It's Italian for "food."
I know you're used to fending for yourself, but I made dinner.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你习惯了照顾自己
‎但我做了晚饭

translation.en: What's the special occasion?
Did someone die?
No, it's Nick's first real dinner with us.
translation.zh:
‎不 今天是妮可第一次
‎正式和我们吃晚餐

translation.en: You did this all for me?
-You don't eat together every night? -[Liz] Hell no.
translation.zh: ‎你们不是每天晚上都一起吃？ ‎当然不是

translation.en: But if you wanna to eat your pizza in your room, that's fine.
translation.zh: ‎如果你只想去房间吃披萨也挺好

translation.en: I mean, I cooked my signature osso buco risotto,
translation.zh: ‎我做了我最擅长的炖小牛膝烩饭

translation.en: and I am a professional chef,
but if you just want gas-station-quality pizza--
translation.zh: ‎但如果你只想吃加油站水准的披萨

translation.en: No. I'm sorry.
It's just, I haven't had a family meal since...
translation.zh: ‎只是我很久没参加家庭聚餐了

translation.en: Well, a long time.
Anyway...
this looks nice.
Thank you.
You know, that's not a bad idea.
Maybe Mom could cook dinner for us every night.
translation.zh: ‎也许妈妈每晚都可以给我们做晚饭

translation.en: And then we could eat together, as a family.
translation.zh: ‎我们作为一家人就可以一起吃饭

translation.en: Sure, no problem.
Or what if we took, like, a family cooking class?
translation.zh: ‎或者我们可以上家庭厨艺课

translation.en: You could literally teach us how to cook
translation.zh: ‎你可以在字面意义上教我们怎么做饭

translation.en: and we could take turns making the dinners.
That actually sounds kind of fun.
Cool.
And Dad used "literally" the right way.
-So how was your first day of school? -Pretty good.
translation.zh:
‎-你第一天上学怎么样？
‎-挺好的

translation.en: I stole the driver's ed. car,
and got a whole three blocks before they brought me down with a spike strip.
translation.zh:
‎开出去三条街区
‎他们才用钉子链条把我给拦下来

translation.en: She's kidding.
You're kidding, right?
It's so hard to tell what's real and what's made up with you, Nick.
translation.zh:
‎真的很难分辨你哪些是真的
‎哪些是编的 妮可

translation.en: Speaking of which, I heard Jeremy was hoping to get a new car
translation.zh: ‎说起来 我听说杰瑞米拿到驾照后

translation.en: when he gets his license.
Until you showed up, and we had to make sacrifices.
translation.zh: ‎直到你出现了 我们不得不做出牺牲

translation.en: Well, about that, I had a thought.
I'm working at Liz's restaurant after school now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在放学后在丽兹的餐厅工作

translation.en: Wait, what?
Surprise.
This girl can carry a freakish amount of cannelloni.
translation.zh: ‎这个妹子能拿得动超级多意大利面卷

translation.en: We'll talk later.
So maybe you could get a job, too,
and buy your own car.
Wait, like a "job" job, where I have to do stuff people don't wanna do?
translation.zh:
‎正经的“工作”吗？
‎我得做别人不想做的事情？

translation.en: This sounds like a pretty good solution.
It's really smart, Nick.
Thank you so much.
You deserve it.
This calls for a celebration.
I saw some sparkling cider in the fridge.
translation.zh: ‎我在冰箱里看到了气泡苹果汁

translation.en: I hope that's okay.
Sure, sounds nice.
Let me go get it.
[Liz] Nick, do you need any help?
No, I'm good.
Well, here's to my new family.
Wait! I want to say something.
I know you've only been here a little while, Nick,
translation.zh: ‎我知道你才刚来不久 妮可

translation.en: but I feel like you coming to us, this is happening for a reason.
translation.zh: ‎但我感觉你到我们家来是有原因的

translation.en: Oh, it's definitely happening for a reason.
No, I mean, maybe this is exactly what we all need, to shake things up,
translation.zh: ‎也许这正是我们需要的 做一些改变

translation.en: make us realize how much we love each other.
translation.zh: ‎让我们意识到我们有多爱彼此

translation.en: I'll drink to that.
Wait. I want to say something, too.
I'll admit that I was unsure about you living with us,
translation.zh:
‎我承认我本来不确定
‎你和我们同住这件事

translation.en: but I was wrong.
You know, you kids could learn from this girl,
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 你们可以向这个女孩学习

translation.en: 'cause she has faced hardship,
and that has given her character.
Thank you.
Should we drink to that?
Wait.
I want to say something, too.
I know you all know that helping people's my thing.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你们都知道
‎我的专长就是帮助别人

translation.en: As long as everyone hears about it.
But I...
feel like Nick is the one helping me.
She's like the sister I never had.
translation.zh: ‎她就像是我从没有过的妹妹

translation.en: Wow. That's actually really sweet.
translation.zh: ‎哇 你这么说真的很可爱

translation.en: So... drink?
Wait. I want to say something, too.
I guess, I'll admit,
I was also unsure about Nick.
Am unsure.
But at the same time, I don't know...
if I'm being honest with myself,
maybe I really am just afraid of sharing what I've got.
translation.zh: ‎也许我确实害怕分享我有的东西

translation.en: Because the truth is...
I do have a lot.
Now, let's drink to that.
Wait!
I'm sorry. It's just...
you guys don't realize how lucky you are to have each other.
translation.zh:
‎你们没有意识到你们拥有彼此
‎是多么幸运

translation.en: I guess it's not until you lose your family that you realize that...
translation.zh:
‎我想只有失去家庭之后
‎才会意识到…

translation.en: family is everything.
And even if you don't always get along,
translation.zh: ‎即使你们不总是能和睦相处

translation.en: or you get on each other's nerves,
just knowing that your family is there...
somehow it just makes everything better.
Now let's drink before somebody else makes a speech.
No, wait!
What the hell was that?
I just saw a Band-Aid... in the bottle of cider...
translation.zh: ‎我刚看到苹果汁瓶里有一个创可贴

translation.en: A used Band-Aid.
I'm sorry. I'll clean this up. Just...
stay right here.
[Sam] Well?
It's not the right time, Sam.
What do you mean, it's not the right time?
We're down the street in a U-Haul.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经开着租来的卡车到附近了

translation.en: I just jumped the gun on calling it.
But the truth is, we need to be patient here.
We can get a lot more than 50 grand if we play this right.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们玩对了
‎能拿到的远不止五万美元

translation.en: How much more?
How does a million sound?
Ed works at a bank.
I can get passwords, account information.
And Liz owns a restaurant.
There's cash just lying around.
I saw it with my own eyes.
So let's not be stupid.
This is a long con.
Why jump at the easy money
when we can take the whole enchilada?
You better be right.
Trust me.
[Nick] Who wants some gas-station-quality pizza?
Don't worry about Sam and Dorothy.
I can put them off as long as I need to.
translation.zh:
‎我可以一直拖延他们
‎想拖延多久都行

translation.en: Trust me.
They have no idea this isn't a random family.
translation.zh:
‎他们完全不知道
‎这并不是随便选的一家人

translation.en: Well, I'd better go.
I don't want them to get suspicious.
You stay safe, too.
I know, I know.
I love you, too, Dad.
